import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../styles/Pay.css"; // import your CarrierSource screenshots import review1 from "../../assets/reviews/review1.png"; import review2 from "../../assets/reviews/review2.png"; function Pay() { const reviews = [review1, review2]; const [current, setCurrent] = useState(0); const nextReview = () => setCurrent((prev) => (prev + 1) % reviews.length); const prevReview = () => setCurrent((prev) => (prev - 1 + reviews.length) % reviews.length); return (

Maximize Your Earning Potential

At RGM Family, we reward drivers for performance, not just miles. Our pay structure ensures your hard work reflects directly in your paycheck. Focus on driving — we’ll take care of the rest.
